title: Ivana & Peter

exploreMessage: Are we just chilling here? Explored any other pages, we are starting to think this website is a one-page wonder. Paging for some adventure, pronto!

faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.qPlusOne: Could you kindly confirm whether we have the option to bring a plus one to the wedding?
faq.aPlusOne: Plus ones will indeed be specified on your invitation

hero.subheader: Big news – we're getting married! Discover all the details about our unique love story and the upcoming celebration. Stay tuned for the magic!

phrases.chat1_1: Hello, my name is Peter. I am from Slovakia.
phrases.chat1_2: Hi, I'm Ivana. I am from Serbia.

place.celebrate: Come celebrate our most important day with us
place.description: Zemplínska šírava, often referred to as the "Slovak Sea," is a breathtaking lake in eastern Slovakia. Surrounded by rolling hills, lush greenery, and sandy beaches, it offers a serene escape for visitors. The crystal-clear waters are perfect for swimming, boating, and fishing, while hiking and cycling trails provide stunning views of the lake. As the sun sets, the colors reflect on the calm waters, creating a mesmerizing atmosphere. The region also features charming villages and towns, allowing visitors to experience the rich culture and history of Slovakia. Zemplínska šírava is a beautiful destination for both relaxation and outdoor activities.
place.description_short: Zemplínska šírava, often referred to as the "Slovak Sea," is a breathtaking lake in eastern Slovakia. Surrounded by rolling hills, lush greenery, and sandy beaches, it offers a serene escape for visitors.
